text:
Code Builder is now built-in, available by pressing C.
The companion app Code Connection is still compatible with Bedrock and Education editions.
Miscellaneous bug fixes
Fixed an issue with the app that would prevent it from connecting to the game client when app is installed via the Microsoft Store for Education

Version number is included in bottom left corner. This number is used when contacting the Support Team.
The back arrow was removed. To return to the development environment selection screen, please click on the Code Connection text
Added a warning when closing the application that this will cause Code Connection to disconnect
Code Connection for Minecraft officially released.
First open beta publicly available. Demo version also available at the Microsoft Store.

texts.text: As of Education Edition 1.7, Code Connection is no longer needed for coding in Education Edition as Code Builder is now built-in to the client. Code Connection is still needed for coding in Bedrock Edition.
